Israel's reign of terror over the West Bank
subhead: Deadly shootings by the army, beatings by settlers, devastating raids, arbitrary arrests, torture in prison: The level of violence inflicted on Palestinians living in the territory has never been so high since the Israeli occupation began in 1967.

subhead: 'Syria, After Assad' (3/4). The slow lifting of international sanctions and the rise of informal housing during the civil war are hindering efforts to rebuild the capital of northern Syria.

title: US lawmakers rebuke Trump's foreign policy with a sweeping defense bill to strengthen European security
subhead: The vote came shortly after the White House published a national security strategy that was a startling attack on Europe. The House's $900 billion Pentagon bill reveals a clear pro-Europe orientation.

title: Sophie Kinsella, British 'Shopaholic' author, dies aged 55
subhead: Madeleine Sophie Wickham, who wrote under the pen name Sophie Kinsella, revealed last year that she was receiving chemotherapy and radiotherapy for glioblastoma, an aggressive form of brain cancer.

subhead: Since the release of the US National Security Strategy on December 5, the increasingly harsh tone of the transatlantic relationship has drawn attention, even though this power struggle was not among Donald Trump's main priorities, writes Le Monde columnist Gilles Paris.

The ultra-rich are claiming an increasing share of global wealth
subhead: The wealth of the ultra-rich is undergoing a historic surge, according to the third report of the World Inequality Lab co-directed by French economist Thomas Piketty. Political choices can reverse these trends, the authors say.

title: Illegal crosses in French public spaces reignite debates over church-state separation
subhead: Calvaries installed on public land in towns in the Alps, on the Mediterranean coast and on the island of Corsica, sometimes with the help of far-right identitarian movements, have rekindled long-standing tensions around France's 1905 law separating churches and state.

title: France's far-right Rassemblement National wants to reopen brothels
